1110100101101000 1010101110001100 1 -> sum: 1001010011110101, cout: 1

1101110011011000 0011001110001010 0 -> sum: 0001000001100010, cout: 1

1010010000000010 0001100010100110 0 -> sum: 1011110010101000, cout: 0
1011101010100000 0011111111111110 0 -> sum: 1111101010011110, cout: 0
